verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> unto my <S%H113>Lord<s%>, <S%H3427>Sit<s%> at my right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, until I <S%H7896>make<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> your <S%H1916>footstool<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of your <S%H5797>strength<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H7287>rule<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

Your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H5071>willing<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H2428>power<s%>, in the <S%H1926>beauties<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb<s%> of the <S%H4891>morning<s%>: you have the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of your <S%H3208>youth<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, and will not <S%H5162>repent<s%>, You are a <S%H3548>priest<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> after the <S%H1700>order<s%> of <S%H4442>Melchizedek<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> at your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H4272>strike<s%> through <S%H4428>kings<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath<s%>.

He shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, he shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> the places with the dead <S%H1472>bodies<s%>; he shall <S%H4272>wound<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> over <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%>.
He shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>: therefore shall he lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%>.
